text: khandita, ‘sapha’ mattu ‘marvah’galu allahana sanketagala salige serive. Allahana bhavanada ‘hajj’ (kaddaya yatre) athava ‘umrah’ (aicchika yatre) nadesuvavanu averadara naduve nadeyuvudaralli tappilla. Sva'iccheyinda olitannu mada horatavanu (tilidirali); allahanu (olitina) prasansakanu jnaniyu agiddane
